mapper.select: select a.PROVINCE_NAME province_name,b.elPi_OwnerCompany,b.pile_count pile_count from tb_m_province a LEFT JOIN (select t.elPi_OwnProvinceCode,t.elPi_OwnerCompany,count(1) pile_count from tbl_electricpile t where t.elPi_State in ('10','15') group by t.elPi_OwnProvinceCode,t.elPi_OwnerCompany) b on a.PROVINCE_ID=b.elPi_OwnProvinceCode;
select count(1) as count from tbl_user_normal_view t
SELECT count(1) as count FROM ( SELECT sum(t.puHi_Monetary), t.puHi_UserId FROM tbl_purchasehistory t WHERE t.puHi_Type = '4' AND t.puHi_Monetary > 0 GROUP BY t.puHi_UserId ) a

select * from (select count(1) pile_count from tbl_electricpile t where t.elPi_State in ('10','15')) a, (select sum(count) electricPositionCount from (select count(1) as count from tbl_electricpile t where t.elPi_State in ('10','15') and t.elPi_Binding = '0' union all select count(1) as count from tbl_powerstation p where p.poSt_Status in ('10','15') ) a ) b

select * from (select count(1) pile_count from tbl_electricpile t where t.elPi_State in ('10','15') and t.elPi_OwnerCompany = '1') a, (select sum(count) electricPositionCount from (select count(1) as count from tbl_electricpile t where t.elPi_State in ('10','15') and t.elPi_Binding = '0' and t.elPi_OwnerCompany = '1' union all select count(1) as count from tbl_powerstation p where p.poSt_Status in ('10','15') and exists (select 1 from tbl_electricpile b where b.elPi_State in ('10','15') and b.elPi_OwnerCompany = '1' and b.elPi_RelevancePowerStation=p.pk_PowerStation) ) a ) b
